T02D2543:1b-1: n'a ma sangga'i ti a'a k'a sha bi ma la n'a ma /

T02D2543:3a-14: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2543:3a-15: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2543:3a-16: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //

T02D2543:3a-51: thugs rjes yongs su gzung bar mdzod //

T02D2543:3b-1: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //

T02D2543:4b-37: g-yas su rdo rje srung ba ser po rdo rje'i khrab thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:4b-38: rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po mche ba thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-0: g-yon du rdo rje khu tshul ser po rdo rje thogs @5a * //
T02D2543:5a-2: de nas gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhi nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2543:5a-6: rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' bsgom mo //
T02D2543:5a-7: de'i phyi rol mtshams bzhin sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-8: phreng ba ma ser mo rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-9: glu ma sngon po pi bang 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-10: gar ma ljang gu rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-11: de rnams shar lho nas brtsams te bsgom mo //
T02D2543:5a-12: gru chad bzhi la spos me ma dkar mo spos phor thogs pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-13: me tog mthing ga me tog 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-14: mar me ma dmar mo mar me thogs pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-15: dri chab ma ljang gu dri'i lde gu thogs pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-16: de rnams kyang shar lho mtshams nas rim bzhin no //
T02D2543:5a-17: de'i phyi rol gyi khyams rnams su byams pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-20: mya ngan kun 'joms rnams mdog dkar po rdo rje thogs pa rnams ni shar du'o //
T02D2543:5a-25: de rnams mdog ser po rin po che'i snye ma thogs pa rnams ni lho ru'o //
T02D2543:5a-26: 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'od dang /
T02D2543:5a-28: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams mdog dmar po padma'i sdong bu thogs pa rnams ni nub tu'o //
T02D2543:5a-29: rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02D2543:5a-31: kun du bzang po rnams mdog ljang gu rgya gram thogs pa rnams ni byang du'o //
T02D2543:5a-32: byang chub sems dpa'i de rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-33: shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po lcags kyu thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-34: lho'i sgor ni rdo rje zhags pa ser po zhags pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-35: nub kyi sgor ni rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po lcags sgrog thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-36: byang gi sgor ni rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang nag dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-37: sgo ba de rnams kyang cung zad khro ba /
T02D2543:5a-38: zhal mche ba lhag ge brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2543:5a-39: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug pa kun du bsgoms pa
T02D2543:5a-40: la mchod pa'i lha mo dang bskal bzang cha mthun
T02D2543:5a-41: pa'i 'khor la dbus kyi rnam snang chen po'i dkyil
T02D2543:5a-42: 'khor la rnam snang dang byang chub sems dpa' rdo
T02D2543:5b-0: rje zhes pa @5b gnas pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2543:5b-1: de ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes kyi dkyil
T02D2543:5b-2: 'khor gyi lha tshogs par snang la bsdus pa spyan
T02D2543:5b-4: aom aa a'a: sarba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya /
T02D2543:5b-6: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga w'a na dznya na m'urtti b'a g'i shva ra /
T02D2543:5b-7: ma h'a p'a tsa sarba dha rmma ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02D2543:5b-8: dha rmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a: manda la /
T02D2543:5b-11: sngags mjug badzra dri shya zhes bya bas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor legs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2543:5b-12: de'i rjes la phyag btsal te /
T02D2543:5b-13: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de /
T02D2543:5b-14: yid kyis sgo phye la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes
T02D2543:5b-15: brjod cing sgo bzhi nas tshur spyan drangs la bgegs
T02D2543:5b-16: bskrad cing yid kyis sgo bcad la /
T02D2543:5b-17: rdo rje'i go chas bsrung la lha so so la
T02D2543:5b-18: bstims te dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2543:5b-19: // rigs kyi yum bzhi nam mkha' la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2543:5b-20: ye shes kyi bdud rtsis dbang bskur te dbang rtags spyi bor mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2543:5b-21: de nas phyag rgyas bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni shar
T02D2543:5b-22: du brtan par bsgoms la bdag nyid lus gnyis kyi
T02D2543:5b-24: lha snam la gnas te rdzas mchod pa lnga phul
T02D2543:5b-25: la sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod de
T02D2543:5b-26: / rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na /
T02D2543:5b-27: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02D2543:5b-28: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa //
T02D2543:5b-29: rdo rje las kun mdzad pa'o //
T02D2543:5b-30: aom badzra satva su sam gra ha zhes bya ba
T02D2543:5b-31: la sogs pa'i sngags dang gar dang glu dang bcas
T02D2543:5b-32: pas dbul lo // byang chub yan lag me tog spos //
T02D2543:5b-33: mar me snag ba byug pa dri //
T02D2543:5b-34: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul //
T02D2543:5b-35: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D2543:5b-38: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a: aom badzra gandhe gan zhes pas mchod do //
T02D2543:5b-39: gzhan yang gsang ba'i yum bzhis mchod de /
T02D2543:5b-40: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02D2543:5b-41: sems can thams cad dga' bar byed //
T02D2543:5b-42: mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che //
T02D2543:5b-43: nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba //
T02D2543:5b-44: mchod pa chen po khro ba che //
T02D2543:5b-45: khro ba chen po dgra che ba //
T02D2543:5b-46: mchod pa chen po chags pa che //
T02D2543:5b-47: chags pa thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D2543:5b-48: 'dod pa chen po bde ba che //
T02D2543:5b-49: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02D2543:6a-2: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2543:6a-4: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2543:6a-5: ces pa'i bar gyis bstod pa'i rgyal po des bstod la //
T02D2543:6a-6: shes rab kyi 'khor lo la sems gtad pa'i yid
T02D2543:6a-7: kyis gsang sngags rgyal po 'di drug bzlas par bya'o
T02D2543:6a-8: / aom badzra t'i kashna du: khatstshe da pradzny'a dzany'a na m'u rtta ye /
T02D2543:6a-10: w'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa na ya te na ma: zhes bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2543:6a-11: de ltar lha bskyed cing gsol ba btab la gnas
T02D2543:6a-12: pa de dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i
T02D2543:6a-14: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya ste /
T02D2543:6a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod la 'gro ba'i don du phrin las la sbyar te /
T02D2543:6a-16: dkyil 'khor chen po drug 'jig rten du spro ste
T02D2543:6a-17: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs bskyed nas nyon mongs
T02D2543:6a-18: pa drug sbyangs 'gro ba drug dbugs phyung dkyil 'khor
T02D2543:6a-19: drug gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar snga ma
T02D2543:6a-20: nyid la bsdu zhing spros nas 'gro ba'i don bya'o
T02D2543:6a-21: // de tsam gyis ni las rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2543:6a-22: de lta bu'i cho ga rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod
T02D2543:6a-23: de lhag pa dang ma tshang ba bshags nas dam
T02D2543:6a-24: tshig gi 'khor lo bsdu zhing chos thams cad stong
T02D2543:6a-25: pa nyid du rgyas gdab cing bde ba'i spyod pa
T02D2543:6a-26: bya'o // de lta bu'i sbyor bas mtshan ma brtan
T02D2543:6a-27: po byung ba de srid kyi bar du bya ste
T02D2543:6a-28: bya'o // / de yang sems rtse gcig tu bsgom
T02D2543:6a-29: zhing zlos pa de la ni dus gsum gyi sangs
T02D2543:6a-30: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te
T02D2543:6a-31: gshegs nas chos kyi sgo thams cad ston par mdzad
T02D2543:6a-32: de sku yang ston to zhes gsungs pas /
T02D2543:6a-33: zhal mthong ba'am rmi lam du lung bstan pa la
T02D2543:6a-34: sogs pa ma byung gi bar du bde bar gshegs
T02D2543:6a-35: pa rnams bsnyen pa ni cho ga'o //
T02D2543:6a-36: de ltar bsnyen pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2543:6a-37: la gnang ba thob nas gzhan gyi don du dkyil
T02D2543:6a-38: 'khor chen pa'i cho ga byed par 'dod pas /
T02D2543:6a-39: ri dang chu klung dang nags tshal la sogs pa'i
T02D2543:6a-40: gnas su slob dpon la slob mas dkyil 'khor 'dri
T02D2543:6a-41: ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2543:6a-42: de nas dkyil 'khor bya ba'i go skabs phye ste /
T02D2543:6a-43: dang po sa'i cho gar yang de bzhin du mnyam
T02D2543:6b-0: pa yin @6b na dbus mtho byang shar gzhol te
T02D2543:6b-1: dma' ba / sa gzhi 'jam pa nyams dga' ba'i gnas su ngam grog dang bya skyibs dang /
T02D2543:6b-2: bong ba la sogs pa med pa 'jam zhing lhun
T02D2543:6b-3: stug pa der dkyil 'khor brtsig pa 'am bri ba'i
T02D2543:6b-4: don du sa'i bdag po la gnang ba thob par
T02D2543:6b-5: byas la / sa'i lha mo la gtor ma phul la /
T02D2543:6b-6: dngos grub rab 'bring thob pas brkos nas ltas brtags
T02D2543:6b-7: la mi shis pa yin na bar chad byung bas
T02D2543:6b-8: dor bar bya'o // shis pa yin na de'i phyogs
T02D2543:6b-9: thams cad byi dor bya ste spos chus chag chag
T02D2543:6b-10: btab la shin tu ba lang gi lci bas byugs
T02D2543:6b-11: la 'thas par bcags te mnyam par me long gi
T02D2543:6b-12: ngos ltar byas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag
T02D2543:6b-14: aom badzra me di n'i badzr'i bha ba ma h'a badzra h'um /
T02D2543:6b-15: zhes pas rdo rje'i sa gzhir byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2543:6b-16: de'i phyogs kun kyang aa ga ru nag po gtul zhing du bas bdug go //
T02D2543:6b-17: de ltar na lhag par gnas pa'i yan lag sa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02D2543:6b-19: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du 'gro bas tshogs bsags la /
T02D2543:6b-20: ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D2543:6b-21: mchod pa rgyas par phul nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2543:6b-22: mchod pa'am bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la /
T02D2543:6b-23: de nas mdun du mandala bya ste /
T02D2543:6b-24: me tog bkram nas sa'i lha mo la mchod yon
T02D2543:6b-25: sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa bshams te gtor ma
T02D2543:6b-26: yang bshams dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te /
T02D2543:6b-28: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi /
T02D2543:6b-29: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02D2543:6b-30: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2543:6b-31: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2543:6b-32: ji ltar sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2543:6b-33: bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar //
T02D2543:6b-34: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02D2543:6b-37: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang
T02D2543:6b-38: gtor ma phul la ye shes pa gshegs su gsol
T02D2543:6b-39: lo // de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod la /
T02D2543:6b-40: slob dpon gyis phur bu bcu gshin rje gshed du bskyed la /
T02D2543:6b-41: dar gyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur la aom badzra
T02D2543:6b-42: k'i li k'i la h'um phat ces gzi brjid bskyed
T02D2543:7a-0: la gzhag go // de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi @7a * //
T02D2543:7a-1: lha rnams rang gi snying gar bcug la langs te /
T02D2543:7a-2: rdo rje gsor shing dril bu dkrol la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02D2543:7a-3: h'um ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D2543:7a-4: sku yi cha byad za byed rngam pa'i stabs //
T02D2543:7a-5: gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis //
T02D2543:7a-6: khams gsum dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2543:7a-7: h'um bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02D2543:7a-8: khro bo'i rgyal po brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
T02D2543:7a-9: nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis //
T02D2543:7a-10: bgegs kun sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2543:7a-11: h'um rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings las thugs rje chen por sprul //
T02D2543:7a-12: skye med ngang las 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bstan te //
T02D2543:7a-13: gdug pa 'dul phyir thugs dam mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D2543:7a-14: khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2543:7a-15: h'um dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i //
T02D2543:7a-16: lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig / gnas 'dir bde gshegs dkyil 'khor pho brang bri //
T02D2543:7a-17: bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin byer bar gyis //
T02D2543:7a-18: gal te nga yis bsgo ba las 'das nas /
T02D2543:7a-19: ye shes can gyi rdo rje 'bar bas //
T02D2543:7a-20: mgo bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas 'gyur zhing //
T02D2543:7a-21: rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02D2543:7a-22: he sa phyogs bgegs gnas che ge mo 'di ru //
T02D2543:7a-23: bdag rdo rje slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya bas /
T02D2543:7a-24: slob ma che ge mo zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2543:7a-25: sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par bya
T02D2543:7a-26: ba'i phyir nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2543:7a-27: chen po'i rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhig bdag gis
T02D2543:7a-28: bri bas / dus de ring bgegs kyi tshogs su gyur pa lha'i gdon dang klu'i gdon dang /
T02D2543:7a-29: lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /
T02D2543:7a-31: nam mkha' lding rgan po dang rgan mo la sogs
T02D2543:7a-32: pa thams cad dengs shig / byer shig song shig
T02D2543:7a-33: / gang mi 'gro ba de ni rdo rje ye
T02D2543:7a-35: mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par gyur ta re /
T02D2543:7a-36: rdo rje h'um ste h'um h'um h'um zhes pa dang /
T02D2543:7a-37: hr'i: shtr'i: / bi kri t'a na na sarba bi
T02D2543:7a-38: ghn'a autstsha t'a ya h'um phat ces bgegs bskrad do
T02D2543:7b-0: // spyan mig bskal @7b pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2543:7b-1: khro bo'i stangs stabs gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pas kyang bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2543:7b-2: de bzhin du rdo rje 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2543:7b-3: de nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02D2543:7b-5: dra ba rnams byas la phur bus btab la gzhag go //
T02D2543:7b-6: de nas tsandan dang ba'i rnam lngas dkyil 'khor byugs la /
T02D2543:7b-7: lha rnams kyi rten dri'i thig le dang /
T02D2543:7b-8: me tog gi chom bu rnams bkod la //
T02D2543:7b-9: rnam snang gi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i snying gnas dkyil 'khor bton la mdun du dgod par bya'o //
T02D2543:7b-10: de rnams la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la mchod pa dang /
T02D2543:7b-11: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis mchod la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2543:7b-12: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir lha mo bzhis bsdus la dbang bskur te /
T02D2543:7b-13: rgyas btab la mchod pa byas te /
T02D2543:7b-15: de ltar rdzogs pa dang mchod pa dang bstod pa rgyas par byas la /
T02D2543:7b-17: rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das /
T02D2543:7b-18: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2543:7b-19: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2543:7b-20: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2543:7b-21: rdo rje can dag 'di zhes pas /
T02D2543:7b-22: nang par dkyil 'khor bzang po'i mtshan //
T02D2543:7b-23: 'di zhes bya ba bri lags na //
T02D2543:7b-24: rjes su brtse bas nyer dgongs nas //
T02D2543:7b-25: kun gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2543:7b-27: de nas bum pa bzang po nag nog med pa'i tshul dang mthun pa lha grangs dang mnyam pa'am /
T02D2543:7b-28: yang na bum pa bdun gu gul gyis bdug cing /
T02D2543:7b-30: dri'i thig le dang mtshan ma bkod la //
T02D2543:7b-36: ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang /
T02D2543:7b-37: srog chags med pa'i chus bkang la /
T02D2543:7b-38: ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul bcings te /
T02D2543:7b-39: 'bras bu can gyi shing gis kha brgyan la bzhag ste /
T02D2543:7b-40: nang du lha thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02D2543:7b-41: las thams cad par gshin rje gshed po bskyed cing ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02D2543:8a-1: cing dbang bskur la phreng sngags dang /
T02D2543:8a-2: gsang sngags rgyal po drug bzlas la gzhag go //
T02D2543:8a-3: bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2543:8a-4: de nas sgrub pa po'i g-yas ngos su gzhung dang mthun pa'i thab khung byas la /
T02D2543:8a-5: las dang mthun pa'i shing dang rdzas bsags te /
T02D2543:8a-6: me lha sngon du mchod la de'i snying gar dkyil
T02D2543:8a-7: 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs mchod rdzas phul la
T02D2543:8a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngar gyi gnas su gshegs te /
T02D2543:8a-11: sngar me lha la rdzas lhag mas mchod la /
T02D2543:8a-12: 'dod pa'i don gsol ba btab nas me lha gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2543:8a-13: de nas ci 'byor ba'i gtor mas chos skyong rnams la tshim par byas la /
T02D2543:8a-14: 'dod pa'i don la phrin las bcol la slar gnas su btang ngo //
T02D2543:8a-15: gtor ma dang sbyin sreg lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2543:8a-16: de nas snod du rung ba'i slob mas mandala byas la /
T02D2543:8a-17: me tog bkram nas me tog gis snyim pa bkang nas /
T02D2543:8a-18: slob dpon la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2543:8a-19: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2543:8a-20: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2543:8a-21: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2543:8a-22: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2543:8a-23: dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol //
